title: Buying a new champ help
body:
I currently dont own " Bard , Cass. Galio , Gnar, Illaoi , Nami , Rek'Sai , Swain , Vel'Koz. Zac , Zyra

i really dont know who to buy next or if i shoudl buy sol when he comes out , i generally dont main a position so im willing to learn anything

replies.body: It depends on your choice - Rek Sai for JG, Illaoi for tanky top, Bard as supp, etc.

IMO

Most fun out of those is Bard, he's also not a bad support atm. Gnar and Nami are also ok atm
